member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Describes the level of support for shader caching in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_NONE
member.summary: Indicates that the driver does not support shader caching.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_SINGLE_PSO
member.summary: Indicates that the driver supports the CachedPSO member of the and structures. This is always supported.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_LIBRARY
member.summary: Indicates that the driver supports the ID3D12PipelineLibrary interface, which provides application-controlled PSO grouping and caching. This is supported by drivers targetting the Windows 10 Anniversary Update.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_AUTOMATIC_INPROC_CACHE
member.summary: Indicates that the driver supports an OS-managed shader cache that stores compiled shaders in memory during the current run of the application.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_SUPPORT_AUTOMATIC_DISK_CACHE
member.summary: Indicates that the driver supports an OS-managed shader cache that stores compiled shaders on disk to accelerate future runs of the application.
